ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: The topic covered in this class is one of the basic parts in modern physics. One should not get Ph.D. in physics without knowing this topic.
I would definately recommend the course to fellow students.I would summarize the course as the quantum mechanics needed to do more advanced statistical mechanics and a foundation course for qft.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course is the first important step in my career...
Yes, the course deepened my interest in quantum mechanics and statistical mechanics
